title: MNS Aurangabad rally: Prakash Ambedkar questions party’s lack of stand, asks, ‘Where is Congress?’ - The Indian Express
content:
1. MNS Aurangabad rally: Prakash Ambedkar questions party’s lack of stand, asks, ‘Where is Congress?’  The Indian Express
  2. Maharashtra: Devendra Fadnavis Holds 'Booster Dose' Rally, Draws Large Group Of BJP Supporters  Republic World
  3. Raj Thackeray's MNS Getting Booster Doses From BJP, Says Shiv Sena's Manisha Kayande  India Today
  4. Raj Thackeray to hold mega rally in Aurangabad today to mark Maharashtra Day  Hindustan Times
  5. BJP attempting to create division among Hindus, alleges Maharashtra CM Uddhav Thackeray  Times of India
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: "In a progressive state like Maharashtra, the role of the Congress, which pledges its commitment to secularism and the Constitution, is questionable when it comes to taking a stand against Hindutva," Vanchit Bahujan Aghadi (VBA) president Prakash Ambedkar said.
